Class Ghost

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.Ghost
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Blinky, Clyde, Inky, Pinky
    public abstract class Ghost
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class from which every type of ghost will inherit.
